unsolved: Other tasks/activities, more conditions, role of form factor
device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
use_cases_desc: A group planning where to visit using multiple tablets
evaluation: User study (qualitative); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
contribution_desc: This paper contributes new insights into the role of a dedicated overview device in a multi-device collocated setup. The paper uses collaborative co-located trip-planning as a representative task.
interaction_techniques: Data transfer/sharing; Visualisation; UI distribution; Cross-device task chaining
crossdevice_def: "allows users to combine their personal devices, such as smartphones or tablets, into one interaction space, allowing them to create a shared itinerary."
